title: A Trip to the Movies
story: I love going to the movies. Me too, Helen. We have to pay first, Daniel. I know. There's the line to pay. Hurry, before the line gets too long. I am hurrying! Do you want to get some popcorn? Sure. What's a movie without popcorn?
summary: Follow Daniel, Helen, and their love for movies as they navigate the journey of paying for tickets and getting popcorn.
image: An image of a movie theater with people standing in line.
